Package Management.GeneralManagement

package Management.GeneralManagement
Provides the main classes handling the management part.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Airship
    This class is used to create airships and to manage their properties, notably their quarters.
    AnimatedThing
    A special type of NonAnimatedThing which have an animated displayed element, such as airships.
    GlobalManager
    This class manages most of the elements of the management part.
    LocalResourcesManager
    LocalResourcesManager creates and manages 3 resources which have different instance for each airship.
    ManagementGamescene
    This class is responsible for the display and some implementations of the interface of the management part.
    NonAnimatedThing
    NonAnimatedThing is used to display non-interactive elements such as backgrounds.
    Resources
    The Resource class wraps the every element needed to describe a resource owned by the player.
    Tech
    Tech is the class describing the properties of a technology, which, once researched, unlock a certain quarter or airship.
    TechManager
    TechManager is the class that creates the technology tree and manages it.
